thread.title: Daniel Craig channels Live and Let Die in the stunning IMAX poster for Spectre - Movies
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig channels Live and Let Die in the stunning IMAX poster for Spectre - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Daniel Craig channels Live and Let Die in the stunning IMAX poster for Spectre - Movies
text: Daniel Craig channels classic James Bond movie Live and Let Die in a creepy poster for Spectre.The just-released promotional image shows 007 wearing a freaky skeleton mask, not unlike the costume worn by voodoo king Baron Samedi in '70s Bond film Live and Let Die. Â© IMAX Which Bond movie is best? The definitive 007 film ranking - from awful to awesomeThis image is taken from Spectre's Day of the Dead parade in Mexico City, which has been previewed in several pre-release trailers.James Bond is on the run once again in this latest adventure, as world-spanning terror group Spectre targets him for extermination. Spectre might have a leg up on 007, considering that it's run by a shady figure (Christoph Waltz) from the secret agent's past.Fans of the franchise should enjoy Daniel Craig as 007 while it lasts - considering that the actor recently said that he'd rather "slash [his] wrists" than shoot another Bond film. Rewind! Watch Daniel Craig's 10 years as James Bond in a surreal 40 secondsAll 6 James Bonds together at last... in wax form at Madame TussaudsThat said, he seems to have no real interest in who could replace him if he does give up his Aston Martin.Spectre opens on October 26 in the UK and worldwide on November 6.
